attributes.action: Equality for English people within the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
We demand an immeditate status of equality for all people legally residing in England to that of our counterparts in Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland. We demand  the right to our own parliament for which the people of England would have the right to vote for our own english representitives who would act on behalf of the people of England for our specific interests such as prescription costs, further education fees, the up holding of our culture and history and the right to be proud of our english heritage and community. We refuse to bank roll other nation states within the union at a detriment to the tax paying, law abiding and hard working people of England.
.
